column2:
When you touched Excalibur, it began to eminate light, and a voice whispered in the air.

 "I am the Lady of the Lake. You found Excalibur and proved it to be yours, wield the sword of your destiny!"

 As the wind calms, you feel a renewed connection to your ancestors.

 This will be quite the story at court!
When I touched the weapon, my body suddenly began to move freely. My movements became as fluid as if Guan Yu entered the battlefield himself. It's as if I am remembering a past life.
Finally, at last I restored the territory of the Roman Empire. It is now time to take the mantle as a true Caesar, while honoring those that came before me.
I have found a number of records that documents Leif Eriksons journey to the American Continent. After arduous study of his methods it is time to put it into practice.
